diagnosis.final_diagnosis: Diverticulitis and Right-sided diastolic congestive heart failure
diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Anemia, Tracheomalacia, Hypertension, Coronary artery disease
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with severe shortness of breath, history of recurrent COPD, and findings consistent with tracheobronchomalacia. Despite high-dose steroids, the patient's respiratory condition did not improve. Imaging showed significant airway compromise. The discharge diagnosis was based on clinical evaluation and the presence of respiratory and cardiac symptoms.
